db.description: The Table Hostess will be responsible to ensure that all VIP Members and guests are greeted and served to the highest standard and in accordance with the company procedures in the venue and at all Playboy events held\r\nThe Table Hostess will be responsible for ensuring that all VIP Member and guests receive a premium level of service, catering to all the VIP Member dining and entertainment requirements within the venue and at all Playboy events held\r\n
db.requirement: - Ngoại hình tốt là lợi thế\r\n- Tiếng Anh giao tiếp lưu loát\r\n- Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong ngành dịch vụ - nhà hàng 5 sao
db.benefit: Sẽ trao đổi trong lúc phỏng vấn
